meanings.definition: A decorative ball or tuft of material used as a trimming.
meanings.sent1: The little girl attached a colorful pompom to her backpack.
meanings.sent2: The cheerleader's uniform had a shiny pompom attached to it.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought the pompom was a toy and batted at it playfully.
meanings.sent4: The pompom on the gift added a festive touch to the package.
meanings.sent5: The pompom on the hat bounced with every step she took.

meanings.definition: A cheerleader's accessory consisting of a ball of fabric or plastic strips.
meanings.sent1: During the game, the cheerleader shook her pompoms enthusiastically.
meanings.sent2: The team's cheer routine involved synchronized movements with their pompoms.
meanings.sent3: The pompom accidentally flew off and landed on the basketball court.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm was like a pair of pompoms cheering everyone on.
meanings.sent5: The sound of the pompoms rustling added to the excitement of the game.
